reviewText: Momiji is a high school student that is a push over. so when Kazuto a wealthy high school student at the same takes an interest in her, Momiji's life changes. Kazuto gets Momiji a job as a live in maid at his house and turns her into his personal pet to take care of all him needs. but when Momiji finds out about the relationship between Kazuto and another maid Shizuru, will she feel betrayed or relieved?
It's a messed up life for this girl. I will collect the series. May have a good ending ...
Loved it.  I mean, I like the whole rape fantasy and the idea of a man being so powerful that he can have any woman he wants, rather she wants to be with him or not.  The art is great too.

This hentai was cheap, there are four episodes, each on seperate dvds.

Story: Our story begins as Momiji's virginity is taken by Kazuto. We learn that Momiji is a girl without a will of her own. While Kazuto is the son of a wealthy and influential family. Kazuto takes an interest in Momiji when he sees her at school, and he goes out of his way to get her to come to live in his house as a maid. Momiji is not aware of the complex relationship that exists between Kazuto and Shizuru. Will she feel betrayed or relieved? This whole thing leads to good character development, especially on Momiji's side. So basically Momiji is constantly getting raped, now if you are used to that, because you are used to hentai's that way, you will enjoy this, if you are new to hentai, and you are not used to that, this may or may not be for you. Regardless, GET USED TO IT!

Animation: The animation is above average, not sloppy at all.

Sexuality: The sex scenes are nicely done, it's garunteed to turn you on.

Voices: The dvd includes both the english and japanese dub. It also includes subtitles in english, german, and french. The english dubbing is really good, that match the characters, and they are in sync.

Censorship: The dvd is completely uncensored, no mosaic.

DVD features: Full motion animated menus, photo gallery, 20 minutes of bonus trailers, and a 30 minute bonus video that is really hot!

Final Word: The video itself is 30 minutes, it is incredible, a well done hentai with a good story, sexy scenes that last a good 4-5 minutes. I am going to follow the series and buy the next 3 episodes. I reccomend this to all hentai fans.

This piece of mangarotica is run of the mill submissive garbage.  The plot is never really explained as it opens with Momiji being forced into sex and not really resisting. she never does.  The story is weak the art is average at best so unless watching the domintion of one who just accepts it is your cup of tea, don't waste your money.

This movie is very short and basically involves a very pretty girl getting raped over and over.  In typical Japanese Hentai fashion, she is crying and orgasming at the same time.  Doesn't really do it for me.
